display_help: Logging out in the Vanguard will grant you a Vanguard Merit after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Vanguard Recruit Day Job badge which will double the bonus of this effect, granting two Vanguard Merits upon mission completion.
display_target_help: Logging out in the Vanguard will grant you a Vanguard Merit after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Vanguard Recruit Day Job badge which will double the bonus of this effect, granting two Vanguard Merits upon mission completion.
